name: ObjectsHelperTest
description: Unit tests for the ObjectsHelper class, focusing on the asClass method and private constructor coverage.

test_cases.name: testAsClassIsAbsentIfNull
test_cases.description: Tests that the asClass method returns an absent Optional if the input object is null.

test_cases.name: testAsClassIsAbsentIfDifferentClass
test_cases.description: Tests that the asClass method returns an absent Optional if the input object is of a different class than the specified class.

test_cases.name: testAsClassIsPresentIfSameTypeAndNotNull
test_cases.description: Tests that the asClass method returns a present Optional if the input object is of the same type as the specified class and is not null.

test_cases.name: coverPrivateConstructor
test_cases.description: Tests the instantiation of the ObjectsHelper class for test coverage purposes only.
